flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intensenflames from its wrists and attacks foesncourageously.fThe stronger the foe, the morenintensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.
BLAZIKEN has incredibly strong legs -nit can easily clear a 30-story buildingnin one leap.fThis POKéMON’s blazing punches leavenits foes scorched and blackened.
It learns martial arts that use punchesnand kicks. Every several years, its oldnfeathers burn off, and new, supplenfeathers grow back in their place.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flamesnfrom its wrists. Its powerful legs let itnjump clear over buildings.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flamesnfrom its wrists. Its powerful legs let itnjump clear over buildings.
Flames spout from its wrists,nenveloping its knuckles. Itsnpunches scorch its foes.
Flames spout from its wrists,nenveloping its knuckles. Itsnpunches scorch its foes.
Flames spout from its wrists,nenveloping its knuckles. Itsnpunches scorch its foes.
It can clear a 30-story buildingnin a leap. Its fiery punches scorchnits foes.
It can clear a 30-story buildingnin a leap. Its fiery punches scorchnits foes.
Des flammes fusent de sesnpoignets et ses coups brûlentnl’ennemi.
Flames spout from its wrists,nenveloping its knuckles. Itsnpunches scorch its foes.
Des flammes fusent de sesnpoignets et ses coups brûlentnl’ennemi.
Flames spout from its wrists,nenveloping its knuckles. Itsnpunches scorch its foes.
Flames spout from its wrists,nenveloping its knuckles. Itsnpunches scorch its foes.
Flames spout from its wrists,nenveloping its knuckles. Itsnpunches scorch its foes.
３０かいだての　ビルを　ジャンプでnとびこす　ちょうやくりょく。ほのおのnパンチが　あいてを　やきつくす。
30층 빌딩을 점프로n넘는 점프력을 가졌다.n불꽃펀치가 상대를 태운다.
Il peut bondir par-dessus un bâtiment de 30 étages.nSes poings enflammés brûlent ses adversaires.
Mühelos springt es selbst über 30-stöckige Häuser.nSein Feuerschlag fügt dem Gegner Verbrennungen zu.
Puede saltar edificios de 30 plantas. Con sus golpesnde fuego quema a sus rivales.
Riesce a superare un edificio di 30 piani con un salto.nI suoi pugni di fuoco inceneriscono il nemico.
It can clear a 30-story building in a leap.nIts fiery punches scorch its foes.
３０階建ての　ビルを　ジャンプでn跳び越す　跳躍力。炎の　パンチがn相手を　焼きつくす。
きょうてきに　であうと　てくびからnほのおを　ふきだす。ジャンプでnビルを　とびこす　きゃくりょく。
강적을 만나면 손목에서n불꽃을 내뿜는다. 점프로n빌딩을 뛰어넘는 다릿심을 가졌다.
Quand il est face à un ennemi, il laisse s’échapperndes gerbes de flammes par ses poignets. Ses jambesnlui permettent de sauter par-dessus les immeubles.
Trifft es auf einen hartnäckigen Gegner, schießennFlammen aus seinen Handgelenken. Seine starkennBeine ermöglichen ihm, über Häuser zu springen.
Ante un rival difícil, expulsa llamas por las muñecas.nTiene mucha fuerza en las patas; hasta puede saltarnedificios.
Quando affronta un forte nemico lancia fiammatendai polsi. Le zampe poderose gli permettono dinscavalcare interi palazzi.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flames fromnits wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clearnover buildings.
強敵に　出会うと　手首からn炎を　噴き出す。ジャンプでnビルで　跳び越す　脚力。
たたかいに　なると　てくびから　しゃくねつのnほのおを　ふきあげ　ゆうかんに　いどみかかる。nあいてが　てごわいほど　はげしく　もえあがる。
싸우게 되면 손목에서 작열하는n불꽃을 뿜어 올려 용감히 덤벼든다.n상대가 버거울수록 강렬히 불타오른다.
Au combat, Braségali envoie des flammes ardentes denses poignets. Il fait preuve d’un courage exceptionnel.nPlus l’ennemi est puissant, plus les poignets de ce Pokémonnsont ardents.
Lohgock stößt heftige Flammen aus seinen Handgelenkennaus und greift seine Feinde mutig an. Je stärker ein Feind ist,ndesto stärker lodern die Handgelenke dieses Pokémon.
En combate, Blaziken expulsa vivas llamas por las muñecas ynataca al enemigo con fiereza. Cuanto más fuerte sea elnenemigo, más intensas serán las llamas.
In lotta Blaziken emette fiamme micidiali coi suoi pugni,nattaccando coraggiosamente il nemico. Più forte è il nemico,ntanto più intenso è il fuoco proveniente dai pugni.
In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists andnattacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the morenintensely this Pokémon’s wrists burn.
戦いに　なると　手首から　灼熱のn炎を　噴き上げ　勇敢に　挑みかかる、n相手が　手強いほど　激しく　燃えあがる。
きょうじんな　あしこしを　もち　３０かい　だてのnビルも　らくらく　とびこす　ことが　できる。nほのおの　パンチで　あいてを　くろこげに　する。
강인한 하반신을 지녀 30층짜리n빌딩도 가볍게 뛰어넘을 수 있다.n불꽃의 펀치로 상대를 새까맣게 태운다.
Braségali a des jambes incroyablement puissantes. Il peutnsauter par-dessus un immeuble de trente étages. Les coupsnde poing enflammés de ce Pokémon peuvent carbonisernses ennemis.
Lohgock besitzt unglaublich starke Beine, mit denennes ein 30 Stockwerke hohes Gebäude mit einem Sprungnüberwinden kann. Die flammenden Schläge diesesnPokémon lassen verkohlte Gegner zurück.
Blaziken tiene unas piernas tan fuertes que puede saltar pornencima de un edificio de 30 pisos con facilidad. Además, danunos puñetazos fulminantes que dejan al oponentenchamuscado y lleno de tizne.
Blaziken è dotato di zampe molto potenti in grado di raderenal suolo un edificio di 30 piani in un colpo solo. I suoi pugninfulminei lasciano il nemico ustionato e talvolta carbonizzato.
Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear an30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punchesnleave its foes scorched and blackened.
強靭な　足腰を　持ち　３０階　建てのnビルも　楽々　飛び越す　ことが　できる。n炎の　パンチで　相手を　黒焦げに　する。
